query: MATCH p = ()-[:SCCM_HasADLastLogonUser|:SCCM_HasCurrentUser|:SCCM_HasPrimaryUser]-(c:SCCM_ClientDevice) WHERE c.name CONTAINS 'PS1-DEV' RETURN p
name: SCCM Client Device Users (Requires AdminService Collection w/ SCCM Admin User)
description: Display the current user, primary user, and AD last logon user for a specified client device
